attributes.action: take action to get Google Maps to remove the Streetview application therefore protecting safety and security
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Google Maps have launched an application called Streetview. This allows you to "zoom" into a particular location and view, as a photo, any details on that street.  You can zoom in and therefore look at a particular lock, security system etc of a property.  It also shows if a motorcycle is present, how quiet or hidden an area is and is a clear invasion of privacy and personal security.
